title: Picardtools mark duplicates using too many CPUs
body:
One of the processes failed with the error message:

`Job 1949538.srvslshpc001 terminated as it used more cores (13.5) than requested (10). `

Though it was resubmitted successfully, this may cause problems with larger datasets.

title: Improve filtering of initial variant files
body: Currently the filter used is minGQ, we should be using minQ too. This will make filtering with vcf2fasta redundant.

title: Add variant annotation
body:
Add the annotation of called variants with SNPEff. 

This will require either the creation of a local SNPEff database, or the use of reference sequences that are already included.
